about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of Cynthia, the doll of a twisted little girl who wants nothing more than to enact revenge upon you. Your goal is simple: survive a gauntlet of deadly traps designed to end your life. Employ strategic thinking and deductive reasoning to solve action-oriented puzzles and make your escape. Just remember to stay sharp and act fast, time is running out.


This game is designed to be brutal. Quick thinking and strategy are required if you want to survive. In true life-or-death fashion, you're put under pressure to solve each trap by any means necessary and get out alive. Rest assured, the solution is always hiding in plain sight.


Everything you need in order to escape each room is given to you. Some rooms even have multiple solutions, given enough creative thinking and problem solving. Pay close attention to any hints given... it may save your life.


Blood is your life-force. The more you lose, the slower and more disoriented you become. Inject yourself with vials of blood found throughout the house to stay quick and gain back precious reaction time. But be wise when choosing to top up your health, resources are limited. You never know when a few extra vials will come in handy.


You'll probably die... a lot. Luckily, unlike real life, you can try again. Use what you've learned each time to devise your own strategy for survival. The challenges you'll come up against have been carefully calibrated, meaning this game can be beat without losing any health... (Excluding a quick, mandatory blood offering.) Aside from that, it's possible to 100% this game, completely unscathed.

short_description: In this twisted horror escape game, play as Cynthia, the doll of a vengeful little girl who wants nothing more than to subject you to horrific traps designed to kill. Use strategic thinking to effectively solve action-oriented puzzles and escape with your life. But be quick, the clock is ticking!
